SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.UI
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.TUI
public class TUI extends UI
This class represents the Text User Interface (TUI) of the game. It extends the UI class and provides methods for displaying game information in the console.

    • showTurnScreen

      public void showTurnScreen(String playerPlaying, String client, boolean isStopped)
      Displays the turn screen, indicating whose turn it is.
      Parameters:
      playerPlaying - The username of the player whose turn it is.
      client - The username of the client.
      isStopped - A boolean indicating whether the game is stopped.

      cardBack - The back side of the starter card.
